I called the Supervisor again, after explain my situation AGAIN, they place me on hold to for 45 minutes review my case file… never to return again. Frustrated, I hung up. Do not do business with HP!!! Poor equipment, poor customer service, not worth it! expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Photosmart Premium C310a e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - Australia, New Zealand
Item.Review:
Pros: Lots of good professional quality features.
Cons: Disconnects from the wireless network too often.
I've had this printer for six months now and finally got it working almost normally. The printer went offline on a daily basis and I had to reinstall the device EVERY SINGLE DAY just to print. After a few months of back and forth with tech support it turned out that my firewall software (CA Security Suite) was conflicting. I had CA adjust their settings, but still on occasion the printer goes offline. So my conclusion is that the wireless component of this printer is terrible. HP needs to coordinate with security software vendors to prevent this annoyance.
Otherwise it's a pretty nice printer when it actually does print.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart Premium C310a e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - Australia, New Zealand
Item.Review: I have always purchased HP printers and computers. It's for at home use and I don't print many documents. I purchased this printer just under 2 months ago and already I am having to change the cartridge for the black ink for the THIRD time. Plus, you have to be fast changing the cartridge. As I was struggling to snap the orange protector off, the cartridge carriage moved back and forth, then "parked itself" to the far right side, where it is totally inaccessable. Had an opened cartridge in my hand, trying to close the top to get the carriage to move to the center again. These ink cartridges are expensive, and difficult to install.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart Premium C310a e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - Australia, New Zealand
Item.ReviewTitle: Best: Network, Duplex, Scan, Copy, Photo
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy setup; Great copier; Helpful menu screen; Wired networking works; 4x6 direct-printed photos; Duplex printing is great; Scanning is easy
Much improved model over my last HP Photosmart (which I loved for 6 yrs.) Wireless feature is not set up yet; both this inkjet and my laser printer do not seem to like to print wireless on my network so I use the wired connections since both are right next to my PC. I have not tried the wireless option yet from a laptop in another room. This HP is sleek and efficient! Scanning is so much easier than it was on my older HP! Both hardware and software are much improved.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart Premium C310a e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - Australia, New Zealand
Item.ReviewTitle: Printer is ready when you are!
Item.Review:
Pros: Touch screen!
Cons: A bit on the big side!
This printer is easy to set up, right out of the box. I first bought the HP - Photosmart Plus Special Edition Wireless e-All-In-One Printer and it had problems with set up so I exchanged it for another one. I didn't have any problem with set up but the photos were terrible, so I returned it and bought this HP Photosmart Premium Wireless e-All-In-One Printer. I had it set up and ready to go in no time and it works great. I've had several HP printers over the years, like my HP Photosmart 8250 that still works like new. I haven't tried the wireless part so I can't comment on it. The scanner works great as well as copy in color or black. I've had this all-in-one for about a month and a half and it does the job for me.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart Premium C310a e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - Australia, New Zealand
Item.ReviewTitle: DO NOT BUY! bought 2, both non functional!!
Item.Review:
Pros: Good features if they had the chance to work
Cons: Who in the world wants a printer to come with bloatware?? Installer is painfully slow and un-necessary...
This printer hasn't been capable of printing 10 sheets of paper before biting the dust. The first printer installed fine, was added to 5 machines...(2 laptops, 2 desktops, 1 server) wirelessly and all test pages printed fine.
The first time I went to actually print something to this printer it printed out 20 blank pages with nothing on it. Looked this problem up online, and there are THRONGS of people griping about this on the HP forum.
I then tried the suggested steps of fixing this printer by running a cartridge alignment......and it failed. I returned the printer for a new one, and upon getting the ... new printer it after doing initial setup the touchscreen went black with a blinking cursor........ok.....so I powered the printer down and back up again and it seemed to come up fine...but not it WILL NOT CONNECT VIA WIRELESS!!!!
Under no circumstances should you purchase this printer AT ALL!! I am a Network Administrator by trade and deal with enterprise level equipment all day so this is NOT user error. This printer is literal garbage or a good shiny paperweight.
I repeat....DO NOT BUY!! expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Photosmart Premium C310a e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - Australia, New Zealand
Item.Review: I guess I know why this printer keeps dropping in price. I had some real issues with it and I am actually surprised others have not. I had printed only test prints and they were fine, I really liked the printer at first. Then, about a week later, I tried to print something and nothing printed. Went through the troubleshooting and all it would print was magenta. Spoke to HP support via live chat on their site and all those efforts failed. Ultimately the guy said the printhead assembly (which holds all the ink cartridges) was defective and they would send me another to swap out myself. But it was going to take more than a week so I went to Best Buy to see if they could fix it sooner since I purchased the warranty. I usually don't buy extended warranties but I am sure glad I did this ... time. I went to swap the printer and no more of this model were in stock. Manager said I could get another model at same price so I started looking at those. While checking those I ran test prints on this model and another Photosmart printer and guess what? Only printed yellow. So printhead assembly on BOTH store demo printers had the same problem I did. Needless to say I went with a completely different HP printer this time. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Photosmart Premium C310a e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - Australia, New Zealand
Item.ReviewTitle: Nothing but a piece of junk!
Item.Review:
Pros: Nothing
Cons: Everything
I had to return the HP model 503A three times because of malfuntions. The first one would not scan or shut off automatically so I returned it. Then the second one would continuously skip and I had to do the clean heads every other day, so I returned it. Then the third one after 3 weeks started doing the same as the 2nd one, so I returned it and bought an Epson 835. So far so good with the Epson 835, better quality and value, than the HP. I've bought HP for the last 20 years, they just lost all of my business.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart Premium C310a e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - Australia, New Zealand
Item.ReviewTitle: Printer Gets Stuck in Power Saver Mode
Item.Review:
Pros: Touch Display and two sided printing
Cons: Printer not waking up from Power Saver Mode
I had no problems setting this printer up. I like the printer when it works, however, the printer comes with a power saver mode and eventually the printer will not awake from this mode. There is no way to turn off this mode. I am currently exchanging emails with HP support. The first fix lasted 48 hours. Will see what they come up with next.
You can search online and find numerous people with the same complaint about this model.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart Premium C310a e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - Australia, New Zealand
Item.Review:
Pros: wireless network, good apps
Cons: size
I had a descent Canon Pixma printer for 3 years that died for no reason, so I wasn't going to get another one of those. After reading reviews and comparing all the features I could, I went with this one. The wireless network printing is great and makes setting up the printer on the 3 computers and laptops we have a snap. Print quality has been great so far with the few pages and dozen or so pictures printed. Also, the apps seem to have some cool potential.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart Premium C310a e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - Australia, New Zealand
Item.Review:
Pros: Set up, Sale price, Compact, AirPrint, ePrint, Touch Screen with Apps
Cons: Nothing yet
This printer replaced my Lexmark printer, which I could not get to work properly. I was very skeptical on setting up this printer after reading some reviews. I have an Apple iMac and an HP laptop. The printer came with easy instructions and the set up was so EASY! This printer recognized my router and iMac immediately. I was just amazed on how easy this set up was. I love the Airprint and the ePrint wireless features. Thank you HP!!

Item.Item: HP Photosmart Premium C310a e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - Australia, New Zealand
Item.Review:
Pros: Print Quality, Internet Printing, and Touch screen
I am very impressed. Easy setup and works with all the computers in the house. I really like the 2 sided printing and being able to print from anywhere via email. Another Great HP Product.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart Premium C310a e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - Australia, New Zealand
Item.Review:
Pros: Very user friendly and excellent performance.
Cons: Nothing yet.
Purchased primarily to Air Print from my iPad, but it has become my primary printer and scanner. It nice to find a product that does everything it advertises.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart Premium C310a e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - Australia, New Zealand
Item.Review:
I am a very loyal HP customer...laptops, desktop, printers, scanners, projection unit.
I had my HP color laser printer go bad after 2 1/2 years and got a reimbursement from Office Max. Opted to pick up Inkjet printer / Photo shop printer.
RE: 310a Review
Pros:
Set up was not bad at all. Great features: wireless connection, two sided printing, dual paper tray (8.5 x 11 and 4 x 6 photo) and what I thought was really a great feature...eprint. eprint does work well just be aware that there is a slight lag between the time the email is sent to printer and then printed.
Cons:
Having a heck of a time with quality of the print output (streaks and inconsistent density of ink). I used the included cartridges to "prime" the printer and from the very start the ... printer would first print a good page and after a brief rest then next print job would be inconsistent. Went back to cleaning mode and then alignment and then printed fine only to have same streaking and inconsistent density come up again. Use so much of the initial ink cartridge (cleaning and diagnotic print) that I had to replace with the XL cartridge. Note: You need to go thru the initial ink cartridges to "prime" the printer. I just started using the off the shelf XL and already had an inconsistent print and had to clean cartridge (level 1 and level 2 cleaning). printed O.K. but want to see what it does tomorrow a.m. Seems like when you give it a chance to sit awhile the inconsistent print quality is an issue...if you run successive prints (after cleaning) it prints fine.
Another issue seems to be that amount of ink this printer goes thru...you need to check out the level drop when you do a diagnostic print and you can see the level "window" start to really drain. Not certain if inkjet is a less costly proposition vs. laser.
Will provide update later.
If no improvement I will be returning to Office Max and either replace the 310a or opt for another model. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Photosmart Premium C310a e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - Australia, New Zealand
Item.ReviewTitle: Good printer after installing new ink cartridges
Item.Review:
Pros: Seems to work fine so far.
Cons: See above
The ink that came with the printer is not worth including with the price of the printer. I had to purchase all new ones to get it to function properly. Now, it is okay, so I am satisfied. However, it was very annoying when trying to install. I almost was going to return it.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart Premium C310a e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - Australia, New Zealand
Item.Review:
Pros: Looks, price
Cons: NOISE! too many ink cartriges
Just sitting here printing pics...and kicking myself for throwing away my last HP printer.
This new one looks sharp and has alot of bells and whistles (which I dont need) and print quality is good.
But This printer is driving me nuts. Yes, I know its a "machine' but my last "machine" (top of line HP 3 years ago) did not make nearly this much sound, and loudly. I expect some sound, but this is ridiculous, I kept wondering if my printer has a defect but it appears its just the engineering. Seriously, it never shuts up.
Also, I miss just having to replace 2 ink cartriges instead of 5.
Sometimes newer doesnt equal better. That said, I dont know what better printer is on the market right now..im stu ... ck with this one for a while. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Photosmart Premium C310a e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - Australia, New Zealand
Item.Review:
Pros: Wireless, prints from anywhere
Cons: touch screen can be slow to respond
Easy to set up and works well as a wireless printer for both my PC and laptop. Prints emails from iphone and work blackberry. apps are cool also.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart Premium C310a e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - Australia, New Zealand
Item.Review: Spent several hours trying to connect it, with no success. Even tried HP support. Ended up sending ot back and getting the B210a. That printer worked perfectly and easy to set up.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart Premium C310a e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - Australia, New Zealand
Item.ReviewTitle: Best printer on the market at price for photos
Item.Review:
Pros: Performance, Price, Wireless, E-Print and Web Apps
Cons: N/A
I stopped in to Best Buy looking for a great color photo printer and the HP rep was actually in the store.He told me that some of the high price printers do not print a great photo print, so I asked him which printer would be a best choice and he recommended the photo premium wireless. This printer is an excellent choice and I have had some great color photo printouts with it. Also the configuration for wireless was a snap and the web apps are also a great plus along with the e-print features on this printer. This is the best wireless color printer in it's price range.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart Premium C310a e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - Australia, New Zealand
Item.Review:
Pros: was easy to set up except the direction ended before touch screen was done
Cons: nothing yet.
so far so good can not complain yet. first time using the scanner it would not scan and asked at store and had to be enabled on the touch screen. direction do not tell you this.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart Premium C310a e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - Australia, New Zealand
Item.Review:
Pros: great features
Cons: poor service support
This printer does everything it says it does, with great quality. The speed is acceptable. However, within a week of setting it up, it would not allow me to scan directly from the printer. I have asked HP to help me fix this, but they are not really helping me. I can still scan from my computer so I am not disappointed with the product.
I havent had a home printer in over 7 years so I am in awe of the capabilities but if you have had one recently, you may not be as impressed.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart Premium C310a e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - Australia, New Zealand
Item.Review:
Pros: Quick and great print quality.
Cons: Does not accept legal size documents.
I really like this All In One. The only thing I didn't realize was that it does not scan or copy legal size documents. It is really goos on ink useage. I am rally happy with this printer.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart Premium C310a e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - Australia, New Zealand
Item.Review:
Pros: AirPrint alone is worth it.
Cons: Gimmicky touchscreen tries to look like an iPhone - fail!
Easy set up and works great with the Mac. Bought it for the iPad AirPrint compatability & that works flawlessly. And not just documents - it automatically detects if your iPhone or iPad is sending a photo & automatically prints onto photo paper! Flawless. The touchscreen is ok - generally works well, and is probably superior to the old hard button navigation systems. Making the screen look like an iPhone is a bad idea, since it's nowhere near as accurate as an iPhone touchscreen.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart Premium C310a e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - Australia, New Zealand
Item.ReviewTitle: Great picture quality but will not stay connected!
Item.Review:
Pros: Picture printing quality
Cons: Won't stay connected to network
Received as a Christmas gift (actually I picked it out for my husband to give me). Connecting to our home network was fairly easy after we eased the security a little. Love the picture printing quality, copying and scanning. Internet features are a lot of fun for the kids! Initial ink supply does not last very long, but had already heard about that on reviews so not surprised. Have even tried the e-mail feature to print from my phone. LOVE IT! Was surprised with having to unplug the printer about every other day before it will come back on-line as it drops connection with router (on/off button won't even work when it goes off-line). Has done better since we set manual I.P. address (only goes off about every ... other day instead of every 6 or so hours! Info I see online says this is an on-going problem with wireless HP printers. Have received a few HP updates (?) addressing this issue but problem not completely solved. Hopefully a patch or fix will be coming soon. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Photosmart Premium C310a e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - Australia, New Zealand
Item.Review:
Pros: Touch screen & apps
Cons: always get a paper jam error
Has some good features, but always get a paper jam error. (Must be something with the software). It's new tech at an affordable price so give it a shot.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart Premium C310a e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - Australia, New Zealand
Item.Review:
Pros: Bright colors; EPrint; Fast clear printing; Wireless; Touch Screen
Cons: None so far
This printer truly is amazing. I haven't found a bad thing about it. The ePrint feature is great. You can give your printer's email address to whomever you choose and they can send material (ie, pictures, Word docs, etc.) as an attachment to an email that they send to your printer and it will print out on your printer. Printing anywhere from my within my home is fantastic as my printer is upstairs. I really can't say enough about it!

Item.Item: HP Photosmart Premium C310a e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - Australia, New Zealand
Item.Review:
Cons: My purpose was lab quality photos--photos are terrible
I have always had HP printers and have been satisfied with quality of photos which is my main focus. Any printer can print text. This is the 3rd after returning 2 others. Colors are garish and red is so overpowering it overtakes the whole photo. I have been trying to rectify this problem to no avail for 3 months. Am ready to toss it out the window. I am researching Canon and Epson high end photo printers although I did not have in mind to be spending anothe $800 when this HP printer is supposed to have lab quality photos. Somebody come show me cause the photos are awful.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart Premium C310a e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - Australia, New Zealand
Item.Review: The printer/scanner fails in about every way, the photo scanning is about as bad as it can get, I think it would look better to take photo of the picture your trying to scan with your cell phone. I know your thinking set the scanner resolution higher, tried that there is not way to adjust it. Photo printing, also horrible, exposure to dark, colors off, overall bad. One thing it does, prints documents just fine.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart Premium C310a e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - Australia, New Zealand
Item.Review:
Pros: i guess it turns on when the button is pressed...
Cons: streaking through print with full ink levels
terrible printer... there must be something wrong with the ink. with full ink levels i have terrible streaks going through pictures and paragraphs to the point it is hard to read or tell what the picture is. i have had 2 that didnt work... and will need to return ANOTHER one for not working... DO NOT waste your money on this printer

Item.Item: HP Photosmart Premium C310a e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - Australia, New Zealand
Item.Review:
I have had no problems with setup for this printer. Used the installation CD provided and my wireless desktop and laptop connected quickly.
The apps are great as we have a young daughter in preschool.
The eprint feature works perfectly with the iphone 4, but having a small issue printing from the iphone 3gs.
Otherwise perfectly happy with this all in one thus far. We have had it for a couple day now.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart Premium C310a e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - Australia, New Zealand
Item.Review:
Pros: um.......
Cons: 1 day useful life
I purchased this printer to replace an aging non wireless Canon. I was attracted by the external appearance, the overall feature set and its ability to support Apple's AirPrint right out of the box. After initial set up I was pleased, but the printer sat idle for 4 days and then would print nothing but blank pages. The print nozzles for all colors were completely clogged. I did 2 second level cleanings which cured all but the yellow (it never came back) but the "fix" only lasted one day. The next day everything was clogged again. I went online to chat with HP and sat in the que for over 20 minutes with no response. Poor quality printer and terrible service levels from HP. I'm taking it back and buying another Canon (AirPrint or not). Af ... ter reading MANY reviews on MANY websites, I'm learning that my experience is pretty common. Shame on HP. Don't waste your time or money on this printer. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Photosmart Premium C310a e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - Australia, New Zealand
Item.Review:
I bought this printer for my parents for the holiday and I had a fairly good experience. After troubleshooting and replacing their wireless router, the printer setup was fairly clean on their desktop and notebook. Be warned you could have problems if your computer has a software firewall enabled, but I was able to work around those by disabling Norton 360 and Windows Security Essentials.
It would be nice if HP could address the firewall problems with Norton, Microsoft and other vendors since most people may not know how to do it.
The print apps and ePrint services are nice features.
One feature that would be nice to have added is an Ethernet Port added to help people install the printer on a wired network or enable an alternate wireless setup (i.e. printer to wireless ... router). expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Photosmart Premium C310a e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - Australia, New Zealand
Item.Review:
Pros: Nothing
Cons: Everything
I purchased this product in November 2010. It printed fine the first day but the next day it acted like it was printing but the paper was blank. I cleaned the print head and tried to realign the cartridges but they would not realign. Took printer back to Best Buy and they gave me another with no problem. Got the second one hooked up and it printed fine the first day but made a repeat performance of the first printer after that. I called HP, who sent me a new print head and assured me that the problem would be solved with that.......guess what......see above for how the first two printers acted and you can guess what happened! Right now I am in HP limbo hades trying to get my money back ! Not only is the product garbage but HP does not seem to ne ... ed me as a customer so they are geting their wish! Please do not buy this printer! expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Photosmart Premium C310a e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - Australia, New Zealand
Item.Review: The Most fun I have ever had with a Printer! We have a Dell printer and it still works fine, but the ink for it is so expensive we never want to use it. This printer has 5 ink slots and the ink is still cheaper than our old one. It took me about 45 min to get it set up and it found our network fast and was very easy to just follow directions and it was set up! Having it s own email address for remote printing is simply awesome! My husband can print anything he wants here, right from his office computer at work! It recognizes photos versus text for those prints and uses the right paper. It does 2-sided printing without me touching a sheet of it. There are more and more apps coming out for it and you can use the apps to print pictures from your Facebook albums without even getting on a compu ... ter. And when you scan something with it it will send it to your computer as a PDF. The cool features of this printer seem never-ending and I would recommend it to anyone! expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Photosmart Premium C310a e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - Australia, New Zealand
Item.Review: The software took over an hour to load, then I couldn't set up an ePrint account from my Windows XP computer (admittedly it runs a bit slow). Had to use the laptop with Windows 7 to get that to work. The touch screen is AWFUL. It doesn't respond most of the time, and when it does, there is a long pause before it will perform the task. Finally, photo prints are not satisfactory - streaks and obvious dots. The apps aren't really that useful either.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart Premium C310a e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - Australia, New Zealand
Item.ReviewTitle: Good Printer, Great Scanner, Works w/ Linux
Item.Review:
Pros: Everything works with Linux, especially the scanner.
Cons: Noisy, a little slow.
Bought this a week ago because I needed a replacement for my flatbed scanner. I use Linux as my operating system, and HP has been very Linux-friendly. In that respect, I was not disappointed. After installing the printer, it went through a self-calibration routine that took roughly 8 minutes. That's a long time. When it was done, however, it took less than 30 seconds to get both the printer and scanner functions working with my Linux OS (Ubuntu 10.10). I've done a fair amount of printing with it and the print quality has, in general, been pretty good. However, there was one print job in which I did get very thin lines (as if it didn't print in those lines) on the page. Strange. I'v ... e also had one occasion where I came into my office in the morning and the screen was flashing "Error: Turn the printer off then back on". I only had to push the power button and it went away, but it didn't give me a warm-&-fuzzy. No computers were on and it wasn't flashing when I went to bed the night before. The scan function has been perfect. In all previous flatbed scanners I've had, they only worked over either a parallel or USB connections. This one will work just fine over the network. I found this out when I finished loading the newest version of Ubuntu Linux onto my laptop last night and tried out the "Simple Scan" program. Only connection from the laptop was the wireless. The scan worked flawlessly. One feature that works fine regardless of the computers connected is the "Copy" function. Previous flatbeds required the scan function to work through the computer and its operating system. In this case, the "Copy" function is built in. Speed is okay for this printer. Two drawbacks are that, one, on the first print, it sometimes goes through many contortions to "warm up". That adds both time and noise(!). Second, as just alluded, is the noise. This is the noisiest printer I've ever had. It goes through so many whirs, bangs, clicks, clacks, and buzzes that it could be a prop in an old- ... expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Photosmart Premium C310a e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - Australia, New Zealand
Item.Review: I just received my new HP printer and I am loving it! It's nice to be able to print my own photos at home and with such good quality! The printer is pretty quick, but it's a little noisy while printing, but that doesn't bother me much. My old printer made more noise while printing than this one. I am very happy that I purchased this printer!

Item.Item: HP Photosmart Premium C310a e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - Australia, New Zealand
Item.Review: I’ve always had excellent results from all HP products I’ve ever purchased. This is the third HP home printer that I’ve owned. Unfortunately after less than a week of use, I had to return it. The printer would hang up for unknown reasons, and the only solution was to unplug the printer – it just would not respond. After 4 days of searching for solutions/problems on the internet, a less than successful ‘chat’ with HP support (who kept telling me to turn save mode off – which you cannot do with this printer), I returned the printer and got my money back. In addition, the touch pad is not easy to use at all (when it worked). I would not recommend this printer to anyone. After I got my money back, I purchased another HP printer (C309) that was on clearance.. that did not have a fancy touch pad ... ....but had lots of other features the C310a did not. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Photosmart Premium C310a e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - Australia, New Zealand
Item.Review: I am a 65 year old grandmother who has been into computers for over 20 years. I use both PCs and a Mac.This is my 6th HP printer and I must say, as always they are dependable, easy and great value. Along the way I had two Epson printers, one being complete garbage and neither had the featues and dependability of the HPs. Also the Epson ink replacement was outrageously expensive. I currently have 4 HP printers up and running but this last one is my favorite. I love the wireless capabilty with all the apps and Internet features. I don't think you can go wrong with this all-in-one, wireless printer.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart Premium C310a e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - Australia, New Zealand
Item.Review:
The product installed wonderfully but after a few days the problems began.
I think there are incompatibilities between the product and Win 7. It would go off-line without provocation. I spent 1.5 hrs today with 1st tier customer support and 2.5 hrs with 2nd tier customer support. They are as helpful as they can be, obviously spending a lot of time with me, but the product is new and they are unfamiliar with it.
The ePrint feature is very helpful when the printer is connected. But, again, it disconnects and the reps could not reconnect it.
HP ought to include a USB cable for situations where even their reps cannot make the wifi work.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart Premium C310a e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - Australia, New Zealand
Item.Review:
This is a dud - it will not scan although the wireless works. It uses lots of ink cartridges when and if it will print. I have replaced the ink cartridge carriage or case whatever and it worked for about 7 weeks. Now it will not print color. I have spent more time with HP techs than I spend with my husband. They "generously" offered to sell me "an excellent printer which uses the same ink cartridges" at a $100 discount and it was the same model printer - insanity.
Doesn't print color - won't scan - buy another one! --NOT!!!!

Item.Item: HP Photosmart Premium C310a e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - Australia, New Zealand
Item.Review: Set up was seamless for me and this printer EFFICIENTLY does EVERYTHING I need. Faxing is almost a lost art so I do not have the need for that. I simply scan documents into emails or Word documents according to the end user's requirements. I love sitting in my lounge handling my small at home business invoices. When I need to scan several documents (or photos) I just sit at my desk working in batches. My iPhone, my MacBook Pro, and my iPad2 said, "there you are and promptly I printed from all these devices."

Item.Item: HP Photosmart Premium C310a e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - Australia, New Zealand
Item.Review: I purchased this H & P printer as a gift which will be used in a mobile construction business. These functions are awesome and have simplified the paperwork needed for my son's estimates and contracts. The jury is still out on the ink use and I will report back on that subject down the road.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart Premium C310a e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - Australia, New Zealand
Item.Review: I have had HP printers for over 20 years. None of them lasted forever but worked well until death. This one is junk. First one died in about one month. HP replaced with a recon. Spends more time adjusting itself than it does printing. Noisy. Consumes ink like it is some kind of addict. A lot of jams and I use HP paper. Fax feed never worked well. And it died just out of warranty. That said, when it worked it worked well.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart Premium C310a e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - Australia, New Zealand
Item.Review:

Item.Item: HP Photosmart Premium C310a e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - Australia, New Zealand
Item.Review: I had an HP C5180 Photosmart printer which I really loved. I had it for about 5 years. Finally, the scanner wouldn't save pictures nor print them. I really didn't want to lose that printer because I loved it. But I broke down and bought this HP C310a Photosmart printer and boy, am I ever happy I did! This printer is fantastic. I'm having trouble getting the wireless part of it working(I'm sure that's my fault) but didn't really need it. I just plugged in the old usb hookup and runs like the other one did...off the computer. I am very happy with this printer and would definately recommend it to anyone who needs a lot done. Printing, scanning, photos. Easy SD card reading and printing. It does it all. Gr ... eat product. expand » « collapse

Item.ReviewTitle: Don't waste your time with this, get a Kodak one
Item.Review: The ink runs out too soon. The cartridges for this, be it the HP Original, High Yield, or Office Depot brand, tend to run out of ink too soon and it tends to have difficulty with the ink. I never should have sold my Kodak printer to my sister. I hope I can still take it back (I bought it in April) and either get a refund or a credit on it, but next time I'm getting a Kodak printer. I don't think I'll ever buy another HP product again, be it computer or printer.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart Premium C310a e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - Australia, New Zealand
Item.Review: this printer is fantastic! no problems what so ever. i read some of the reviews online and was nervous about having the same issues, but so far so good! installation was easy and i was immediately able to print from my PC and macbook! I love being able to print from my laptop from anywhere in the house! The eprint program is a great tool! i have no regrets in getting this printer and i highly recommend it to anyone who is looking for a great color wireless printer!

Item.Item: HP Photosmart Premium C310a e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - Australia, New Zealand
Item.ReviewTitle: Does the job with quality results.
Item.Review:
Pros: Great Print Quality; Easy To Use; Reliable
Cons: Directions ambiguous; Clunky noise starting; Hesitates before printing
I am a teacher and a photographer. I can easily copy images or pages from my resources at home without having to lug books back and forth from home to school.(A+) Copying, scanning , and printing are all easily accessible from the adjustable touchscreen.(A+) Photo printing is easy and the print quality is professional looking.(A+) Ink is quite expensive, though. (F) Overall, I'm impressed and very happy with the decision to go with this model.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart Premium C310a e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - Australia, New Zealand
Item.Review: From the order to the delivery I say Job Well Done H-P. The installation for my wireless printer was easy to follow the directions.So far Really like the features of the touch screen on the printer.Love the printer so far no complaints.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart Premium C310a e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - Australia, New Zealand
Item.Review:
Set up like a dream. It did all the work. The touch screen asks a few questions and voila, it's done. Works right away with the IPad. A few seconds with the CD in your computer and it can print and scan with your wireless network.
I gave the email address to my kids and now I often get pictures of my grandchildren in the printer tray. A nice surprise.
It is also a great scanner.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart Premium C310a e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - Australia, New Zealand
Item.Review: Love the new printer. Set up was a snap. I have an Apple mac and it found the printer right away. It took less than 30 minutes to set up the printer. My husband started printing from his Ipad without a problem. Prints great and is user friendly.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart Premium C310a e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - Australia, New Zealand
Item.ReviewTitle: Great Wireless Printer for Apple Products
Item.Review:
Pros: I can print from my Ipad and Iphone
Cons: Haven't figured that out yet!
This is my first wireless printer and I am delighted with it. I bought it specifically to print from my Ipad. It was very easy to set up (despite the fact I was told by the sales person that wireless printers were difficult to install and I needed the Geek squad to do it). I was up and running in no time. This printer also prints remarkable photos. I would highly recommend this printer.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart Premium C310a e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - Australia, New Zealand
Item.Review:
Pros: I can print wireless from my computer, IPAD and IPhone.
Cons: Setting up, if you have never set up a wireless printer before
Although this printer is a little slow, I was able to set it up wireless with my laptop computer. Afer that was completed, I went to my IPAD and tried to print and it printed immediately. I then went to my IPhone and tried to print and it also printed immediately. This printer has everything I need in a printer; it can print, copy, scan, print pictures and one less cable on my computer.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart Premium C310a e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - Australia, New Zealand
Item.ReviewTitle: Ignore the Bad Reviews - It's A Great Printer!
Item.Review: I don't understand all the bad reviews. It's like people either love or hate this printer. Are they talking about the same printer?? I've had the C310 for a few months and love it. The ink jets do NOT clog - ink levels are still very high. I wanted to add OCR - called the HP help line and "Edward" added the necessary software - FREE! The C310 does a beautiful job with color photos and scanning.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart Premium C310a e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - Australia, New Zealand
Item.Review: This printer never downloaded fully and the software was uninstalled and reinstalled about 3 times. It did not work with windows 7. I never could scan with the software. I am very dissappointed with the purchase and I sent it back to HP. I wanted to throw is out the window!

Item.Item: HP Photosmart Premium C310a e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - Australia, New Zealand
Item.Review:

Item.Item: HP Photosmart Premium C310a e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - Australia, New Zealand
Item.ReviewTitle: Absolute Worst Printer I Have Ever Owned!!!
Item.Review:
This has been my absolute worst purchase of 2011. This printer seems great when you first unbox it and set it up, but it has been a nightmare since.
PROBLEM 1 - I am an MBA student who needs documents printed quickly, and I spent the extra money to be able to print from my Iphone using the Airprint feature. Unfortunately the printer decides when It wants to connect to my Iphone, and given its selective nature, I never get to utilize this feature. (printer problem not Iphone)
PROBLEM 2- Network connectivity issues. Just like my Iphone can not connect to the printer, neither can my computer. Once again, I have scoured the internet to find solutions for this. I have tried every solution possible, including required updates and even tech advice from Hp and none have worked. Pleas ... e note that nothing is wrong with my wireless network, and that if you search HP printer forums there are many other people who have the same unresolved connectivity issues with this printer. I am not sure why Hp hasn't resolved this issue. Needless to say, the printer I purchased for grad school has yet to serve its purpose.
Problem 3- The Touchsmart screen is plastic, and non-responsive. You have to press the touchscreen plenty of times before it accepts your selection. If you have an iphone you will be highly disappointed in the sensitivity of the screen, it just does not cut it. The main dilemma here is that there aren't any actual buttons to use on this printer besides the power button, so basically you have to fight the touchscreen to operate anything on this printer. Please Note I do own an HP Touchpad with an amazingly easy screen to operate, why this technology wasn't used on this product is beyond me.
Problem 4- Another great feature is the E-print, you get your own E-mail address directly to the printer. Problem is your printer will never communicated with this e-mail address rendering it USELESS.
Problem 5- When using the Touchsmart screen, the printer is so slow to load anythin ... expand » « collapse

Item.Review: bought this one had to return it - streaks & lines, color balance terrible, software problems - used to be hp fan but now tired of dealing with out of the box problems with hp products. bought a canon mg5220 - excellent right out of the box, costs less, user friendly install, more capability, print from mobile device is simple direct to printer process no extra services required, scanning works.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart Premium C310a e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - Australia, New Zealand
Item.Review: After having several excellent HP printers, I insisted to my husband that we only buy HP! This one is not good! It prints sometimes, and wont feed the paper or photo paper easily at all. It shakes and is very unreliable. Occasionally it will print a beautiful picture but never know when. I wish I could get another of the older reliable models!

Item.Item: HP Photosmart Premium C310a e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - Australia, New Zealand
Item.Review:
Pros: Multiple ink sources
Cons: Loud, slow, crashes repeatedly, printing quality is only average, motherboard unstable, extremely poor HP support
Of all the different types of printers I have owned over the last 30 years, this one is the absolute worst one! I had problems with it from the start. I have reinstalled it three times and now the chip on the motherboard that controls its wireless capabilities is nonfunctioning. HP was unreasonable and not very helpful during all these trials. It will still print if hard wired to the laptop but that is not what I bought it for! My recommendation to anyone considering this printer ... don't be conned like we were.

Item.Review:

It automatically changed the ports on all my computers!!! Supports Air print for my IPhone. I print more thing from my phone then my computer. Very worth the money, HP did a good job on it.
Cons: The only thing that I really dislike on the printer is that the touchschreen is a little too touchy and I end up going into apps that I don't need to at the time. the OS on the printer seems to be a little slow on some commands, however it is a printer. Hopefully a new update might fix some of those issues. Ink dosen't last as long as they state.(however when is that ever true anyway)
I would seriously consider this model!! I have ... been away from HP for a while and I am glad to see that they have gotten there act together on their printers expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Photosmart Premium C310a e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - Australia, New Zealand
Item.ReviewTitle: Great Printer!! Worth It!! Get It!!
Item.Review:
Pros: This is a great printer. If you are looking for a wireless printer this is the one to get! It picked up all my wireless networks right away and when I put it on the network I wanted it to be on, I put the info in and bam it started to work. Put it on Win 7 Pro, 7 Enterprise, 7 Ulitmate, & Ubuntu and all printed just fine.
Cons: There are no rj11 or rj45 ports in this model, so if you wanted to fax you would have to do it via software. The hp eprint club is hard to work with, hard to move around with it on the web and actually use one of the apps you picked not an app that is already loaded in the printer.
With it had rj11 & rj45 ports, make the hp eprint club easier. the model it placed the same thing almost but this one has a bigger screen but sometimes its ... hard to move around in it. Best way so far is using a pencil to move the stuck around. have a good day. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Photosmart Premium C310a e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - Australia, New Zealand
Item.Review: Set-up was simple and relatively quick. Plugged it in and followed instructions on the printer screen. It hooked-up to my wireless router in less an 10 seconds. I ran the driver dvd on a desktop and laptop. I downloaded the driver from HP support to a netbook. All of these steps were easy. I established the eprint email address on to smart phones, no problems. So, I now have five devices that print to this machine. This printer produces great looking photos and documents. The scanner and copier work great. I don't have anything negative to say about this printer or my purchasing experience using the HP Store.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart Premium C310a e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - Australia, New Zealand
Item.Review:
Pros: Quality printing
Cons: A little on the technical side for amateurs.
My main thing i was looking for was a printer that would print great 4 x 6 photos. I do a lot of digital photography. These print out SO PERFECTLY! And the 4 x 6 photo paper has it's own loading area which is very handy. I updated everything new. Computer, monitor, external harddrive, and printer. And this printer is the first thing I tell everyone about. IT"S THE BEST I'VE SEEN!

Item.Item: HP Photosmart Premium C310a e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - Australia, New Zealand
Item.ReviewTitle: Fine for home printing of docs and emails, etc.
Item.Review:
Pros: pretty fast for home computer
Cons: print quality is just average
This printer is fine for home use of usual docs and emails, Too soon to rate the ink usage but so far it appears to be average. I would recommend this printer for home use.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart Premium C310a e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - Australia, New Zealand
Item.Review:
Great features -- but prints from the photo tray started printing off-center after 75 or so total photo prints over three months -- leaving a 1/16 inch white border down the right side [the fixed side of the tray] -- regardless of where I print from [PC, iPad, iTouch or from the printer itself].
It's almost like the tray needs to have adjustment bars on both sides -- not just the one it has on the left side. I can get the printer to print properly by putting a shim cut from mount board along the right side of the tray, but gee, I shouldn't need to kludge a three month old printer.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart Premium C310a e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - Australia, New Zealand
Item.Review: I love the printer but when it came it was missing all of the ink cartridges. It appeared that HP made the mistake when the item was boxed but when I called them they didn t want to do anything about it because I did not purchase the printer from a Certified Seller of their products. HP did finally agree to send me the ink cartridges. It s great to have everyone printing to one main printer and you can get the inks in XL so they last longer.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart Premium C310a e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - Australia, New Zealand
Item.Review:
Purchased 5/30/2011 Installed and printed test page - seemed to work fine. Went on vacation, returned and tried to print photos on 6/20/2011. The printer would not print. HP support first thought it was a defective print head then decided it was a defective printer.
Pros: Individual ink cartridges for color and black ink (2 black ink cartridges) Automatic double sided printing Quality on test photo was good, but not as good as my older photosmart.
Cons: Touch screen is not aligned. I have to be careful about where I press. Mine is a little high so I have to click above the button for it to click. Ink cartridges have a new hard plastic twist cap - its like twisting a really tight lid off of a soft drink bottle - only it's about 5x harder. My mother was not ... able to open them, but she has arthritis. I liked the older cartridges better - they had a thin plastic tape you peeled off. Noise - this model is noisier than my old photosmart.
Warning - HP will only replace with a refurbished unit, not a new one. This is the 4th printer I've purchased from HP over the years, the second one had a defective print head immediately after purchase and HP replaced it with no problems. So I have a 50% failure rate with HP now. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Photosmart Premium C310a e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - Australia, New Zealand
Item.ReviewTitle: Great printer for the multi-computer home
Item.Review:
Pros: double-sided printing, built-in wireless
Cons: slow built-in applications, slow start-up
I was drawn to this printer for its advertised Apple AirPrint compatibility, but it has been much easier to share this printer between all my computers (Mac OS X and Windows Vista/7) than any that I've tried before. The built-in applications that let you get information without a computer are handy in a pinch, but I find them to be slow. The printer can calso take a bit of time to get ready to print after sitting for a while. Double-sided printing capability is handy for reducing paper usage.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart Premium C310a e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - Australia, New Zealand
Item.Review:
Pros: decent quality prints
Cons: slow. fails to connect.
At first this printer was great. Then suddenly it just stopped connecting to the computer. I am running Windows 7 on a Gateway all-in-one. I have tried every update available. I have tried every "solution" on HP's boards. I have gotten in and messed around with all the settings on my computer and on the printer. No joy.
As I read through hundreds of posts about this printer, everyone seems to be having the same issue. The printer will one day cease to connect wirelessly. I now have a wire going to my computer in order to be able to print and I can't print from any other computers on my network.
HP has no solution other than what I have already tried numerous times. I would stay away from this printer if y ... ou need to use it wirelessly. If you don't, then it works well enough. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Photosmart Premium C310a e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - Australia, New Zealand
Item.ReviewTitle: Prints wireless with ipad 2, laptops and mobile
Item.Review:
Pros: wireless print from any device
Cons: Print Cartridge reading low first month with not much printed
Easy to configure for wireless devices, if there is a problem printing from mobile device make sure you have correct driver.
My only complaint is the printer is telling me I am running low on ink and I just bought the device. Not much has been printed on it. I am hoping the cartridges from the factory were bad or had very little ink in them.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart Premium C310a e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - Australia, New Zealand
Item.ReviewTitle: Best print options, LOVE LOVE LOVE
Item.Review: I got this e-printer about 1-2 months ago. From reading other reviews, guess I got the best one working. It about set itself up as when started it found wifi by itself and began working, didn;t have to use usb cord. Have printed almost every day. I'm into printing favorite recipes. Also print colored plastic canvas crafts for me and my sister. The ink holds up very well. Am still using the ink that came with the printer. The printer has never disconnected. (Kodak printer had to be unistalled and installed every time I wanted to use.) Loved printing from APS. Played with the e-printer, set up to print through the e-mail, It worked. Will check again when I go to Mo. and print from there. Scanning was easy,whether to print from scanner or to scan to pc. Love my 310a!!!

Item.Item: HP Photosmart Premium C310a e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - Australia, New Zealand
Item.Review: Straight to the point. I love Hp printers and I have not brought any of the competitors printers but after buy this model, I'm having a change of thought. AND i brought three of them. This is the worst product HP has put out. I have had more problems with this model. I would trade the three that I have for one good printer. Im a photographer and I've lost money twice attempting to use these printers.
